oai_dc:dc.dc:title: James A. Shelton family photo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: James A. Shelton family photo. Shelton was born in Jackson County, Alabama, in 1842 to Andrew J. and PaBany Williamson Shelton. He enlisted at Iuka, Mississippi, on August 24, 1861, and served in Co. A., 23rd Mississippi, CSA. Shelton was in the Battle of Franklin where he received wounds and was taken prisoner. He lost his leg and was released from POW camp at Point Lookout, Maryland, on June 6, 1865. He married Martha Norton. Shelton died in Middleton, Tennessee.
